MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Scholar Green, affecting properties in Margery Avenue and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible in stages by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:27pm on the 28th April 2021.
